etymology.description: 充 + 值 + 卡 = a card used to add value/credit.
etymology.interpretation: Modern compound where 充值 means adding credit/balance and 卡 is the physical or virtual card medium. Common in Mainland usage; in Traditional Chinese regions, 儲值卡 is more prevalent.

parts.english: value; worth; be worth; on duty

examples.chinese: 我买了一张充值卡(我買了一張儲值卡)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yì zhāng chōngzhí kǎ.

examples.chinese: 你可以用充值卡给手机充值(你可以用儲值卡給手機儲值)。
examples.pinyin: Nǐ kěyǐ yòng chōngzhí kǎ gěi shǒujī chōngzhí.
examples.english: You can use a recharge card to add credit to your phone.

examples.chinese: 这张游戏充值卡已经被使用过了(這張遊戲儲值卡已經被使用過了)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè zhāng yóuxì chōngzhí kǎ yǐjīng bèi shǐyòng guò le.
examples.english: This game recharge card has already been used.
